dmca.title: [EV1-C2053816U] SPL AV Infringement 2006/07 NRID13983

-0600 (CST)
Received: (qmail 4235 invoked by uid 89); 6 Dec 2006 17:27:12 +0000

        by 0 (qmail 1.03 + ejcp v14) with SMTP; 
        6 Dec 2006 17:27:12 +0000
Return-Receipt-To: sebt@nr-online.com
Date: Wed, 06 Dec 2006 17:27:12 +0000
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: SPL AV Infringement 2006/07 NRID13983
Subject: SPL AV Infringement 2006/07 NRID13983
From: "Sebastian Taylor" <sebt@nr-online.com>
To: "info@alterviata.it" <info@alterviata.it>
CC: "abuse@ev1servers.net" <abuse@ev1servers.net>
X-Priority: 1
Importance: High

Disposition-Notification-To: sebt@nr-online.com
User-Agent: NRDB/2.0

Message-Id: <20061206172728.6F19C1C99E@mailin.ev1servers.net>

X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of
TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
Return-Path: sebt@nr-online.com
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Dec 2006 17:27:28.0744 (UTC)
FILETIME=[CDB7C680:01C7195B] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sirs  
 
The Scottish Premier League (SPL) has the exclusive right to
commercially exploit all matches within the SPL including, but not
limited to, all moving images and other audio/video content.  
 
We have noticed that your Web Site http://vilan.altervista.org is
displaying and/or offering SPL's audio visual content. This material
includes links to AV material situated on other sites or links to P2P
channels which include SPL material. 
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the SPL to use
this content, your present use is an infringement of the SPL's rights.  
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of the SPL`s rights or remedies,
including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not
explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which are
expressly reserved. 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that the SPL is the owner of the exclusive rights
referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf
with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of the SPL
I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the content
in the manner complained of is not authorised by the SPL, its agents, or
the law. 
 
I, Sebastian Taylor, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally
sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Sebastian Taylor 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA
Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1730
